text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I'll go... and get the star.

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text: Uh... I'm sorry, but how?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I can handle snow. Tell me where the<n>star is, and I'll go
down the mountain<n>and get it.

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
Wh-what?! N-no, you don't need to<n>go through all that
trouble! We can still<n>have the party without it!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: But the kids—that star's reallyimportant to them. So we do needit for the party.

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me for saying it, but you<n>aren't known for your
sense of<n>direction... And I must admit it's far<n>too
dangerous for me to go out there<n>with you.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I'm better at directions in the<n>mountains than I am in the big
city. I'll<n>be fine. Be right back.

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
W-w-w-wait a second, please! I<n>haven't even told you
where to go!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Is everything all right? We could hear<n>you all the way from
our cabin...

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
Biwa Hayahide?! What are you—no,<n>never mind! I need your
help. Please<n>stop Uguri!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Ah, I see. So that's what happened.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
It's not so dangerous right now. And<n>you know we have
the strength to run<n>on a snowy mountain.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
But I'm clumsy with words, so I<n>can't make them feel at
ease... Would<n>you explain it to them?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry, but I cannot. I agree with<n>your fans about this.

text_block_list.name: Oguri & Taishin
text_block_list.text: Wha?!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It's true that you can get through this<n>snow if you take on a
small amount of<n>risk. However small though, a risk is<n>still
a risk... It's dangerous.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Think about it. On the off chance that<n>you're hurt, how will
your fans feel?<n>What would they do?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I... well...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Oguri, you asked me before what I<n>thought you should give
to them.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
What could make everyone happy<n>and is also something
you're capable<n>of giving? I believe the answer<n>already
lies within you, Oguri.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
We've no choice now but for me to<n>tell you. The answer... is
yourself.<n>That's what I wanted to convey to<n>you.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Myself?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Yes. You want to be Santa today, but<n>that's exactly what
your party-givers<n>are trying to do for you.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Their desire is to give you all the<n>support you need. It's as
simple as<n>that. And you, the object of their<n>adoration, are
trying to repay them in<n>turn.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Doesn't your intention alone make<n>the most heartwarming
present? The<n>star of the party needn't do anything<n>
reckless.

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text: Hayahide's exactly right. We're allso thankful for the care you'veshown us.

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
If you'll just be here with us and<n>enjoy the party, even the
children will<n>understand. So, please...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
You're right. It'd be bad to make<n>everyone worry. I... I
guess... I<n>shouldn't...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: What about you, Oguri?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Taishin?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
I mean, what about what she wants<n>to do? Oguri wants to
make them<n>happy by doing something herself.<n>Isn't that
important?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: So what if her intentions are goodenough? Oguri doesn't just want todo enough for her fans.Sometimes you wanna give or dosomething... more special.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
So I think we should let Oguri do what<n>she wants. And stop
telling her to<n>just... be here.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
A present... shouldn't be something<n>that's so simple to
give.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Put more explicitly, simply having youtwo here is enough for me. So Imay have been overenthusiasticabout doing everything myself.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Taishin...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Thanks, Taishin... That's right. I want<n>to return everyone's
well-wishes in...<n>my own way.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Even if it's just one kid who's sad, I<n>want to make them
smile. I can't...<n>back down from a challenge. I... want<n>to do
what I can.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I understand how you feel. But in our<n>current predicament, I
must insist that<n>going out to get the star is too<n>dangerous.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
From my grasp of it, the star is quite<n>large. Even if you were
to make it<n>down the mountain, it would be<n>incredibly
difficult to carry it back up<n>by yourself.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Taishin and I would help... but we're<n>inexperienced with the
snowy terrain.<n>I'm afraid we'd be more of a<n>hindrance to
you. If we had some<n>other means...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hm... well...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: No need to worry about that. ♪

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: You two! ...Did you come for the<n>party?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
No, silly! We said we're looking for<n>holiday miracles! And
Marvey's radar<n>was pinging like crazy in this<n>direction!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! My marvelous sixth sense has<n>brought us together
again! ☆ But<n>that's not all. ♪

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: We can help you with somethingmarvelous. ☆ 'Cause it's smoothsailing to move big stuff around inthat! ★

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: You know what that means... It's time<n>for takeoff, Oguri! ♪
